tags: the chickens from this episode are famous
I hope chickens flapping around david's crotch aren't too hot for tumblr
summary: Behind the Scenes of The Fires of Pompeii (Part Five) Excerpts from Benjamin Cook’s coverage (as featured in Doctor Who magazine...
caption:
Behind the Scenes of The Fires of Pompeii (Part Five)

Excerpts from Benjamin Cook’s coverage (as featured in Doctor Who magazine #395) on filming in Italy:

“Afternoon, sweetheart,” says Phil Cornwell, delivering his line as scripted. He doesn’t get any further. “Sorry, a fly went up my nose. Can we go again?”

“Yeah, can we?” says Catherine [Tate]. “I spat quite a lot in that take.”

“Phil was very professional,” David [Tennant] pipes up. “He took it, quite literally, on the chin.”

“And I almost trod on a chicken,” continues Catherine. “They’re fantastic chickens, aren’t they?”

“One was flapping around my crotch for quite a long time,” says David. “Did you see? We’re practically married.”

In fact, the Italian chickens are suicidal. Barely a take passes without one slamming itself into a wall, sliding down pitifully, then shaking itself off and strutting away as though nothing had happened. “It’s a chicken nightmare,” considers Julian Howarth, the sound recordist.

Other Pompeii Behind-the-Scenes posts:  [ one ] [ two ] [ three ] [ four ]
Other Doctor Who behind-the-scenes posts can be found [ here ]

blog.name: whovianfloozy
blog.title: The Whovian Floozy
blog.description:
My fandom name is Beachy, and this is a multi-fandom blog. 
I'm also a multi-shipper. It's likely I do not sail your ship, but I don't wank and expect visitors to play nicely as well. That includes not adding hate or negativity to my posts, altering them to suit your own ships, or removing my original comments. If you do, you will be blocked.
IRL they call me Doctor. Yep, I'm that old. Sometimes I write things that other people watch. It's all good! I like mocha latte with bourbon. A lot.

summary:
nymph0d0ra 
 replied to your photo   “Of all the sexiness that David Tennant has put forth I still think...”
                   ...
body:
nymph0d0ra

replied to your photo

“Of all the sexiness that David Tennant has put forth I still think…”

What is this from? ��

It’s from a 2010 mini-series called “Single Father”. If you’re a David Tennant fan it’s a must see, but bring tissue. Lots of tissue.

summary: Trouble’s just the bits in between! It’s all waiting out there, Jackie. And it’s brand new to me. All those planets, creatures...
text: Trouble’s just the bits in between! It’s all waiting out there, Jackie. And it’s brand new to me. All those planets, creatures and horizons-I haven’t seen them yet. Not with these eyes. And it’s gonna be… Fantastic!
